resources.string: Trying to scale and crop a bitmap in a single step using ImageDecoder (API 28).

First case. Steps:
1. Apply scaling making the image size be 1/2 of the initial size using decoder.setTargetSampleSize.
2. Apply cropping making the final height be 1/2 of the scaled height from the previous step.

It works as expected.

Second case. Steps:
1. Apply scaling making the final width be 500px (keeping the aspect ratio) using decoder.setTargetSize.
2. Apply cropping making the final height be 1/2 of the scaled height from the previous step.

Doesn\'t work.
